titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2,6-Dichlorobenzonitrile.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4772-4774)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1998, the suspension of duty on 2,6-Dichlorobenzonitrile.
